- Window: pre-`1.0.0` stabilization

- Matrix status:

- Repeated flaky jobs (if any):

## 2) Repeated Incidents
- Top repeated `code` values:
- Top repeated failure groups (`code` + signature):
- New incident classes this week:

- Agent payload contract tests:
- Redaction policy usage in bundles:
- Any diagnostics contract drift found:

## 4) Release Gate Status
- [ ] `pytest` stable
- [ ] docs build stable

- [ ] no high-severity open defects
